name: Mathematics
description: This subject covers basic mathematical concepts such as algebra, geometry, and calculus. Grading is based on homework assignments, quizzes, tests, and a final exam.

name: Physics
description: Physics introduces students to fundamental concepts in mechanics, electricity, magnetism, optics, and thermodynamics. Assessment includes laboratory reports, problem sets, quizzes, midterms, and a final exam.

name: Chemistry
description: Chemistry explores the properties and behavior of matter. Evaluation criteria include laboratory work, problem-solving exercises, quizzes, midterms, and a comprehensive final exam.
